document_data.name: Sambril Lane
document_data.starts: The [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Sambril Lane''' was a minor avenue of hard packed dirt and [[gravel]] in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This alleyway ran from north to south, extending off from the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]] and terminating at [[Smuggler's Run]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Gelfuril the Trader]], a shop that stood at the intersection of Sambril Lane and Smuggler's Run.
* [[Thomm Warehouse]].
